tool_description: Calculates optimal safety stock levels based on demand variability, lead time uncertainty, and desired service levels to prevent stockouts.
error_messages: Invalid demand parameters: demand_mean and demand_std must be positive numbers
Invalid lead time parameters: lead_time_mean must be positive, lead_time_std must be non-negative
Service level out of range: Must be between 0.50 and 0.99
Unrealistic variability: Standard deviation cannot exceed mean by more than 200%
usage: Input demand_mean, demand_std, lead_time_mean, and service_level. Optionally specify lead_time_std for more accurate calculations.

total_buffer_days.description: Safety stock coverage in days of average demand
